Attributes.description: Approved and supervised technical work experience in an industrial, university or government setting for a minimum of 14 weeks. Normally taken in the Winter Session (Term 2) in third year. Technical report required. Restricted to students admitted to Co-operative Education Program in Atmospheric Science.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: ATSC 201 and one of GEOB 300, GEOS 300.
